title: What champs need new skins
body: Hey guys, I recently made a Powerplant Zyra skin but I think making a skin for a champ that hasn't have one for a while. I went through the champ characters in game but it was hard to go through each one and see the latest skins. What champs haven't have a skin for awhile?

replies.body:
Top ten, based on time since their last skin:

1. Yorick (6 years, 4 days).
2. Urgot (5 years, 4 months, 21 days).  
3. Swain (5 years, 1 month, 3 days).  
4. Cassiopeia (4 years, 4 months, 18 days). 
5. Shen (4 years, 4 months, 18 days).
6. Viktor (3 years, 8 months, 25 days).
7. Rumble (3 years, 2 months, 22 days).
8. Heimerdinger (2 years, 11 months, 12 days).
9. Veigar (2 years, 9 months, 29 days).
10. Jarvan IV (2 years, 9 months, 1 day).

Not that anyone's counting.  :)

{{champion:420}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:240}} {{champion:203}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:421}} 

I don't recall any of them getting skins in the past 2 years (except for elise but that was an esports skin, some of their release skins, and maybe super galaxy kindred if that wasn't as long as I remember.)

elise/reksai/zilean/kled should be taken off the list.  illoai is borderline being long enough considering she isn't that popular.

And kled just hasn't been out that long, but his popularity has risen alot so sure
blood moon elise and zil I think were in the last two years?
Blood moon elise I think was January 2015 and released with thresh. Technically 2 years.
